Title: Relates to authorizing a state personal income tax credit for elementary and secondary school personnel for certain expenses incurred for school related supplies
Summary: Authorizes a state personal income tax credit for elementary and secondary school personnel for certain expenses incurred for school related supplies for taxable years beginning on or after January 1, 2026.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing a state personal income tax credit for elementary and secondary school personnel for certain expenses incurred for school related supplies
